text:
[Verse]
Twinkle lights shining bright
In the sky every night
Feet on fire we take flight
Move until morning light

[Verse 2]
Neon streets we ignite
Rhythm flows such delight
Hearts in sync perfect sight
Dance till dawn feels so right

[Chorus]
Dancing stars we come alive
Feel the beat we're gonna thrive
In the night we all arrive
In this rhythm we survive

[Verse 3]
Bass is pumping feel the tide
Electric love can't hide
Music's magic from inside
Join the wave let's all ride

[Bridge]
Every move every glance
In this world we take a chance
Lost in song lost in trance
In this night eternal dance

[Chorus]
Dancing stars we come alive
Feel the beat we're gonna thrive
In the night we all arrive
In this rhythm we survive
title: Dancing Stars
